upgradeCycle.description: Every 7.5 minutes (450 seconds), lane creeps receive permanent upgrades. Maximum 30 stacks at 225 minutes.

abilities.name: Runty
abilities.description: Deals 25% reduced damage to heroes and 30% reduced damage to reinforced units.

abilities.name: Piercing
abilities.description: Deals 50% bonus damage to non-hero units, 50% reduced damage to heroes, and 65% reduced damage to reinforced units.

siege.name: Siege Creep

abilities.name: Reinforced
abilities.description: Deals 50% bonus damage to other reinforced units and buildings. Takes 50% reduced damage from hero attacks and 30% reduced from non-heroes.

siege.spawnInfo: First spawns at 5:00, then every 5 minutes. +1 per wave at 35:00 (max 2).

flagbearer.name: Flagbearer Creep

abilities.name: Inspiration Aura
abilities.description: Grants 3 HP regeneration to nearby allies. On death, grants 44-49 gold to enemies within 1200 radius.

abilities.name: Runty
abilities.description: Deals 25% reduced damage to heroes and 30% reduced damage to reinforced units.

flagbearer.spawnInfo: First spawns at 2:00, then every 60 seconds, replacing one random melee creep. Does NOT scale with time.

upgradeCycle.description: Neutral creeps upgrade every 7.5 minutes (450 seconds), up to 30 stacks.

abilities.name: Prospecting Aura
abilities.description: Increases nearby allied heroes GPM by 20/25/30/40 within 1200 radius.

abilities.name: Ensnare
abilities.description: Roots target for 1.75 seconds. 15s cooldown, 75 mana.

abilities.name: War Stomp
abilities.description: Deals 25/50/75/150 magical damage in 250 radius. Stuns heroes 1.6s, creeps 3s. 12s cooldown, 50 mana.

abilities.name: Cloak Aura
abilities.description: Grants 10/12/14/16% magic resistance to heroes and 20/24/28/32% to creeps within 800 radius.

abilities.name: Critical Strike
abilities.description: 20% chance to deal 200/225/250/300% critical damage.

abilities.name: Packleader's Aura
abilities.description: Grants 30% attack damage bonus within 800 radius.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.description: Reduces enemy attack damage by 50% for 4s in 300-500 radius. 16s cooldown.

abilities.name: Hurl Boulder
abilities.description: 75 damage to heroes, 150 to creeps, 0.5s stun. 800 range, 30s cooldown.

abilities.name: Shard Split
abilities.description: On death, splits into 2-3 Shard Golems with 250-370 HP.

abilities.name: Shockwave
abilities.description: 160 magical damage projectile traveling 1200 units. 700 range, 8s cooldown.

abilities.name: Unholy Aura
abilities.description: Grants 3/5/7/11 HP regen per second within 800 radius.

abilities.name: Thunder Clap
abilities.description: 150/200/250/350 magical damage in 300 radius with 25% slow for 3s. 12-9s cooldown.

abilities.name: Death Throe: Power
abilities.description: On death, grants 50% attack damage bonus to nearby allies for 5s.

abilities.name: Swiftness Aura
abilities.description: Grants 15/18/21/27 attack speed bonus within 800 radius.

abilities.name: Death Throe: Rush
abilities.description: On death, grants 100 attack speed bonus to nearby allies for 5s.

abilities.name: Hurricane
abilities.description: Pushes target unit 400 distance. 400-750 range, 30-22s cooldown, 100 mana.

abilities.name: Toughness Aura
abilities.description: Grants +3 armor to nearby allies within 800 radius.

abilities.name: Raise Dead
abilities.description: Summons 3 Skeleton Warriors (250-375 HP, 11-22 damage) for 35s. 20s cooldown, triggers at <50% HP.

abilities.name: Ensnare
abilities.description: Roots target for 1.75s. 15s cooldown, 75 mana.

abilities.name: Fireball
abilities.description: 85 DPS in 300 radius for 8-12s. 15s cooldown, 200 mana.

abilities.name: Splash Attack
abilities.description: 100% splash damage in 250 radius on each attack.

abilities.name: Dragonhide Aura
abilities.description: Grants +3 armor to allies within 800 radius.

abilities.name: Slam
abilities.description: 250 magical damage in 350 radius with 60% slow for 2-3s. 6s cooldown, 150 mana.

abilities.name: Frenzy
abilities.description: Grants ally +75 attack speed for 8s. 8s cooldown, 75 mana.

abilities.name: Granite Aura
abilities.description: Increases max health of nearby units by 15/16/17/19% within 800 radius.

laneCreepStats.description: Calculate lane creep stats at a given game time

neutralCreepStats.description: Calculate neutral creep stats at a given game time

waveGold.description: Total gold from clearing a lane wave at a given time
